thread.title: Dannii Minogue speaks out after hearing X Factor nemesis Sharon Osbourne has been slating her again
thread.title_full: Dannii Minogue speaks out after hearing X Factor nemesis Sharon Osbourne has been slating her again

author: Nicola Agius
title: Dannii Minogue speaks out after hearing X Factor nemesis Sharon Osbourne has been slating her again
text:
Dannii Minogue speaks out after hearing X Factor nemesis Sharon Osbourne has been slating her again The Australian beauty insisted she wants nothing more to do with the veteran star Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Dannii Minogue says her feud with Sharon Osbourne is completely "one-sided". 
The former X Factor co-judges have clashed many times over the years but Dannii insists she wants nothing more to do with Sharon. 
She told the Sunday Mirror's Notebook magazine: "I honestly don't think about Sharon. I heard she was making comments about me again, and it's a one-sided argument that I'm not involved in. She's just not a part of my life." 
Dannii has now returned to UK TV screens on Let It Shine and she is a big fan of her "easy on the eye" co-stars Gary Barlow and Martin Kemp. Dannii Minogue says her feud with Sharon Osbourne is completely "one-sided" (Photo: David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock) 
She said: "Gary is very easy on the eye. Everyone says he's got better with age. You should see the girls in the audience staring at him with puppy-dog eyes. Read More Dannii Minogue is finding her Let It Shine co-stars 'very easy on the eye' - but enjoying her private new relationship 
"It's that dreaminess. He is lovely, it's hard to concentrate. Same with Martin Kemp, he's still really gorgeous. Last night, he walked in and gave me a big hug and kiss, and I was like, 'This is my job!' I'm hating it, as you can tell." The former X Factor co-judges have clashed many times over the years but Dannii insists she wants nothing more to do with Sharon 
Dannii also admitted that becoming a mother six years ago to son Ethan has changed her attitude to her career. 
She explained: "I've got that lioness thing where I want to protect him, so the jobs are important because I want to look after him. But everything has to be timed to the schedules of being a parent. Dannii is now a judge on Let It Shine alongside Amber Riley, Gary Barlow and Martin Kemp (Photo: BBC) 
"I mostly do things that don't involve me being in a different hemisphere, so I can work from my office and do the school run every day. And when I am away I'll be lying in bed jet-lagged reading mum blogs about the 12 best lunchbox items, thinking, 'Must do that when I get back.'" 
*Let It Shine rteurns to BBC One on Saturday at 7pm Like us on Facebook
